name: tm32
effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Creates illusory
copies to enhance
elusiveness.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Creates illusory
copies to enhance
elusiveness.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user creates
illusory copies of
itself to raise its
evasiveness.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user begins moving so quickly
that it creates illusory copies to
raise its evasiveness.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a
powerful flash.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all
combatants except Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.
